Posts.Content: Melanie01 wrote: I'm 43 years old and had my first mammo last week. No family history and I've never had any lumps or dimpling, pain, etc. It came back abnormal and it says oval shaped mass noted in upper right breast at the 12 o'clock position and questionable adjacent focal area of architectural distortion noted just inferiority on MLO view only. I have to go back tomorrow and I'm completely freaking out! Christmas was terrible, I'm a nervous wreck. Insight please?! I already have anxiety and panic disorder so this is horrific!!! Thanks ladies! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: So worried!!!!! Melanie01

Posts.Content: Dec 26, 2016 10:02PM Melanie01 wrote: Thanks Melissa. I'm praying hard that this is the case!

Posts.Content: Dec 29, 2016 01:45AM Melanie01 wrote: ok so...what a long day it was...the mammo still showed something so I had the ultrasound. I really began to panic when they came back to do more ultrasound pics. The doctor finally came in and told me to breathe! It was a fibroadenoma. Also had some fibrocystic tissue. He told me I'm fine! I'm so relieved. He will follow me up in 6 months to see if that grows or is stable but no cancer. Thank y'all so much!!
Posts.Title: So worried!!!!! Melanie01

Posts.Content: Dec 26, 2016 10:05PM Melanie01 wrote: No it doesn't say suspicious or anything. It just says what I wrote in my original post. Google is not my friend. I have worked myself up into sheer panic. Ativan is the only way I got through Christmas. I'm praying so hard!
